meanings.sent1: She is noncommitted to any specific plan for the weekend.
meanings.sent2: He appears noncommitted to joining any clubs at school.
meanings.sent3: The noncommitted attitude of the cat towards the new toy was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her noncommitted response to the invitation left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The noncommitted clouds drifted lazily across the sky.

meanings.sent1: The noncommitted student rarely completed his homework on time.
meanings.sent2: She seemed noncommitted to improving her skills in painting.
meanings.sent3: The noncommitted approach to gardening led to some interesting results.
meanings.sent4: His noncommitted support for the team was evident during the match.
meanings.sent5: The noncommitted worker often left tasks unfinished.

meanings.sent1: The noncommitted audience showed little interest in the performance.
meanings.sent2: He remained noncommitted to the ongoing debate in the office.
meanings.sent3: The noncommitted response from the crowd was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her noncommitted participation in the project was noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The noncommitted student sat quietly at the back of the class.
